comments.author: Robert Muir
comments.body:
here is a patch for modules.

i will look at the rest of contrib while i wait for the policeman to look at this one.

comments.author: Robert Muir
comments.body: the policeman informed me the patch is ok, so i will commit it, but there are more generics problems in contrib/queryparser...

comments.author: Robert Muir
comments.body: the queryparser warnings were trivial, just raw types that needed to be generified: see revision 1003990.

description: There are some generics violations... we should fix them.
